author.name: Trail Marks
author.description: Experience the Annotated Web as an Extension of (y)our Mind(s)\nTrailMarks are  Thought Vectors in (inter)Personal  Mutual Learning Spaces\n∀  is a Conversation

html:
Beautiful. The power of ideas are limited only by your imagination

Ideas are not everything but without ideas thought or embodied in things there is No-thing No-thought
emptiness, void, the source of it all?

And that's an idea too!

https://t.co/7JLqtERg1S https://t.co/oIry4Z8u6J https://t.co/vPWVEU5fvw

author.name: Codex OS

html: The secret is to be profoundly frivolous, and not the reverse ... https://t.co/ESEv5UjQVB

author.name: ⚡️ Ev Chapman 🚢 | Creative Entrepreneur
author.description: I build digital products with @tana_inc + @NotionHQ. And help creators build a joyful writing inbox practice that drives their ideas & content for years.

html:
Kurt Vonnegut on creativity:

"Practice any art.... no matter how well or how badly. Not to get money or fame, but to experience becoming, to find out what's inside you, to make your soul grow."

Practice creativity - because you can. Because it's good for you ✌️
